Kakashi.title: The Missing Icha Icha Paradise
pages: Kakashi sighs deeply as you approach. 'Ah, young shinobi... I seem to have misplaced something very important.'
'You see, I was just reading my latest novel - Icha Icha Paradise: Tactics - when suddenly it was gone!'
'I had it with me at the training grounds, then went to get some dango... When I returned, it was missing.'
'This is most troubling. That book contains... valuable tactical information. Yes, tactical information.'
'Would you help me find it? I suspect someone at the training grounds might have taken it.'

minigame.title: Find the Thief
minigame.description: Three suspicious individuals were at the training grounds:

options.hint: Known to disapprove of Kakashi's reading habits
Has a history of pranks and mischief
Would never take something from his 'eternal rival'

minigame.successText: You found Naruto hiding behind a tree, flipping through the book! 'Hehe, I just wanted to see what Kakashi-sensei was always reading!'
minigame.failText: Unfortunately, your investigation led to a dead end. The real thief got away!

Naruto.title: Believe It! The Ramen Promise
pages: Naruto grins widely as you approach. 'Hey! Want to train with me? But first, let's get some ramen!'
'Ichiraku's is the best! But... I promised Iruka-sensei I'd help him clean up first.'
'Can you help me finish my chores faster? If we hurry, I'll teach you a cool move!'

minigame.title: Clean-up Race
minigame.description: You and Naruto have three chores to finish. Which do you tackle first?
minigame.successText: You finish sweeping in record time! Naruto cheers, 'Let's go eat ramen!'
minigame.failText: You chose the slowest chore. Naruto groans, 'Now we're late for ramen...'

Sasuke.title: The Path of Power
pages: Sasuke stands alone, gazing at the sky. 'If you wish to learn from me, you must prove your resolve.'
'Strength is everything. But so is control.'
'Let's see if you can keep up with my training.'

minigame.title: Shuriken Challenge
minigame.description: Sasuke throws three shuriken at targets. Which target do you aim for?
minigame.successText: You hit the moving target! Sasuke nods, 'Not bad.'
minigame.failText: You miss. Sasuke turns away, 'You need more practice.'

Sakura.title: Strength of Heart
pages: Sakura greets you with a determined smile. 'Medical ninjutsu isn't just about healing. It's about courage.'
'Can you stay calm under pressure? Let's find out.'

minigame.title: Emergency Aid
minigame.description: A teammate is injured! What do you do first?

options.hint: Always address the most urgent danger.

minigame.successText: You act quickly and save your teammate! Sakura beams, 'You have the makings of a great medic.'
minigame.failText: You hesitate and your teammate's condition worsens. Sakura sighs, 'Try to focus on what's most urgent.'

Hinata Hyuga.title: Gentle Steps
pages: Hinata bows politely. 'I... I would be honored to train with you.'
'The Gentle Fist is about precision and inner strength.'
'Let's see if you can sense the flow of chakra.'

minigame.title: Chakra Flow
minigame.description: Hinata asks you to identify the strongest chakra point.

options.hint: Vital, but not the strongest point.
A key point for Byakugan users.

minigame.successText: You sense the chakra in the stomach. Hinata smiles, 'You have a good eye for chakra.'
minigame.failText: You choose incorrectly. Hinata gently corrects you, 'Try to feel the flow, not just guess.'

Shikamaru.title: A Drag of a Day
pages: Shikamaru yawns. 'Man, this is such a drag... But I guess I can teach you something.'
'Strategy is about thinking ahead. Let's play a quick game.'

minigame.title: Shadow Trap
minigame.description: You and Shikamaru are playing shogi. What is your opening move?
minigame.successText: You surprise Shikamaru with your move. He grins, 'Not bad for a rookie.'
minigame.failText: Shikamaru easily counters your move. 'Too predictable,' he says.

Rock Lee.title: The Power of Youth
pages: Rock Lee greets you with a sparkling smile. 'Let us train with the power of youth!'
'Endurance is key. Can you keep up with my regimen?'

minigame.title: Endurance Sprint
minigame.description: Lee challenges you to a race. What do you focus on?

options.hint: Fast, but you might tire quickly.
Slow and steady wins the race.

minigame.successText: You pace yourself and finish strong! Lee gives you a thumbs up, 'Youth prevails!'
minigame.failText: You burn out too quickly. Lee encourages you, 'Never give up!'

Asuma.title: The Will of Fire
pages: Asuma sits under a tree, puffing on his cigarette. 'Hey, kid. The Will of Fire burns in all of us.'
'But it's not just about strength. It's about protecting your comrades.'
'Let me test your resolve. Imagine your team is in danger. What do you do?'

minigame.title: Test of Resolve
minigame.description: Your teammate is trapped under rubble during a mission. What do you do?

options.text: Rush in alone to save them.
Call for backup and plan a rescue.
Leave them and complete the mission.
options.hint: The mission is important, but at what cost?

minigame.successText: You call for help and coordinate a rescue. Asuma nods, 'That's the Will of Fire.'
minigame.failText: You act alone and get hurt. Asuma shakes his head, 'Think about your team.'

Guy.title: The Springtime of Youth
pages: Guy strikes a pose. 'The Springtime of Youth is upon us! Are you ready for a challenge?'
'Only those with a burning spirit can master my techniques.'

minigame.title: Dynamic Entry
minigame.description: Guy asks you to break a boulder. What do you do?

options.text: Kick it with all your might

minigame.successText: You find a weak spot and shatter the boulder! Guy beams, 'Youthful wisdom!'
minigame.failText: You hurt your foot. Guy laughs, 'Don't forget to use your head!'
